h2_title: Where to Find the Apramana Bat
h3_title: Apramana Bat Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: The Apramana Bat is a larger gold variant of the lesser Apramana Bats you've encountered, and while some moves will be similar, this boss can dish out damage quickly while remaining frustratingly out of reach. Still, when it does get close enough to strike, a well-timed Rock Solid deflection can send it crashing to the ground, and is useful to have for this fight. It can also use frozen winds to deal chilling attacks you should be ready for, so have warming medicine on hand or consider equipping a Curio that reduces frostbite, and consider trying the Ring of Fire to warm yourself up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Apramana_Bat.md', within the main section titled 'Apramana Bat', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Apramana Bat' and the sub-subsection 'Apramana Bat Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The Apramana Bat is a larger gold variant of the lesser Apramana Bats you've encountered, and while some moves will be similar, this boss can dish out damage quickly while remaining frustratingly out of reach. Still, when it does get close enough to strike, a well-timed Rock Solid deflection can send it crashing to the ground, and is useful to have for this fight. It can also use frozen winds to deal chilling attacks you should be ready for, so have warming medicine on hand or consider equipping a Curio that reduces frostbite, and consider trying the Ring of Fire to warm yourself up.
